name: Opensource for  UX Writers & Content Designers
description:
Here's the deck for the presentation I did on opensource for UX Writers and Content Designers.


In January 2022, UX Writers - India group had an online meetup focused on opensource and working with developers.


It's time to take content design be a part of the wider conversation. Let's talk about it on Twitter (@iprithvitharun), shall we?
